location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire to Francis Warden, Secretary to the Government, Bombay

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has suffered from pest damage, which has obscured the body of the letter towards the end of f. 74. As a result, the text in this area is difficult to read.

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of a communication dated 10 November 1807, which gave leave to copy a letter dated 7 November 1807 from the Superintendent of the Marine. The Resident further informs the Government of Bombay that he has detained the HCC Teignmouthat Bushire and sent the HCC Nautilusdirect to Bengal.
